result.arabic_text: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
result.translation: 89.Kaadu A-Nabiyow cus:Nabii Zakariyya seeceeh isi Rabbi kaliace waqdi, Yi Rabbow baxa sinni inkittuh yoo macabinaay diinil yoo nagra baxa yoh acuw axcuk, Yi Rabbow atu kayril yoo ciggiila marak kayrih yayse Rabbi kinnitok.
